title: Android 13 Beta 1 has a fun new animation for media controls
content:
Every new version of Android updates the look and feel of the notification panel, usually with changes to the quick settings panel and notification organization. The first Developer Previews of Android 13 already updated the design of the media controls under the quick settings, and now Android 13 Beta 1 is adding a bit of

The post Android 13 Beta 1 has a fun new animation for media controls appeared first on XDA.
description: Google already revamped the media controls in Android 13 DP2, but Beta 1 adds a new squiggly line to the playback controls.
